results.title: The Runaway Brain
results.creator_credit: John Bassett and Canadian Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “A Planet for the Taking”.
This programme asks the central question, can we begin to see ourselves not as dominant but as integral, as just one part of the complex pattern of matter and life. Host David Suzuki talks to some of the world’s greatest thinkers about whether science and technology can solve the problems they have created.

results.title: Human Nature
results.creator_credit: John Bassett and Canadian Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “A Planet for the Taking”.
Host, David Suzuki introduces this program with an update on the global environmental crises. Filmed in Botswana, Tanzania, Kenya and the U.S.A, human nature is an exploration of the origins of the human species and the biological inheritance we share with other life forms.

results.title: How to marry a millionaire
results.creator_credit: Jean Negulesco, Nunnally Johnson and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Marilyn”.
Lauren Bacall, Betty Grable and Marilyn Monroe are three glamorous models on the lookout for a rich man. Pooling their funds, they decide to rent a luxurious Manhattan penthouse in order to lure their catch. Things are not what they appear to be as two of them fall in love with “poor men.” In the attempt to stop each other from marrying the wrong man, the threesome give their best performances. Utimately, it is love and not money which influences their choices. This film is a must see for lovers of Marilyn Monroe’s quirky and individualistic comedy style.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jean Negulesco, Nunnally Johnson and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation

results.title: How to marry a millionaire (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Jean Negulesco, Nunnally Johnson and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Marilyn”.
Marilyn Monroe, Betty Grable and Lauren Bacall star as three fashion models in search of millionaire husbands. They pool their resources and rent an expensive penthouse with mixed results. Marilyn Monroe gives an excellent performance as a near-sighted beauty who won’t wear her glasses in public.

results.title: Star Quality
results.creator_credit: Alan Dosser, Alan Shallcross, Quintet Films and BBC-TV
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Star Quality : The Stories of Noel Coward”.
At first a young writer, whose new play is being staged, thinks that the production will be plain sailing, but soon he’s convinced that he and his play are doomed, when the star quality of the leading lady and the director come into conflict. Screenplay by Stanley Price, based on the original by Noel Coward. Starring: Susannah York, Ian Richardson and David Yellan.

results.title: Mr. & Mrs. Edgehill (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Gavin Millar, Alan Shallcross, Arts and Entertainment Network, Quintet Films and BBC-TV
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Star Quality : The Stories of Noel Coward”.
Lady Cynthia is a woman of wealth and position, but she is touched and amazed at the love and devotion Mr. and Mrs. Edgehill feel for one another. What is it that makes this ordinary couple so content with their life - even on a remote and desolate South Sea island. Starring Judi Dench and Ian Holm and adapted from a story by Noel Coward.
